title: At least 100 dead in Afghanistan after powerful earthquakes, U.N. says
description: The earthquake struck western Afghanistan, where officials feared the death toll could rise significantly.

title: Ukrainian village where missile killed 52 starts to bury its dead
description: On Friday, emergency workers started clearing space from a wooded area beside the Hroza village cemetery to make room for all the newly dead.

title: What’s behind the violence in Israel and Gaza? Here’s what to know.
description: The violence erupted suddenly Saturday but comes after a year of rising tensions between Israel and Palestinians in the West Bank and Gaza.

title: ‘Humiliated and defeated’: Fear, shock grip Israel after Hamas assault
description: The attack caught Israel’s vaunted military and intelligence services off guard, and sparked bitter recriminations after warnings from security officials.

title: 7 suspects in killing of Ecuador presidential candidate found dead in prison
description: The deaths threaten to hamper an FBI-supported investigation into the assassination of presidential candidate Fernando Villavicencio.

title: Videos show captives in Gaza and Israel
description: The Washington Post has independently verified three videos appearing to show captives held in Gaza and surrounding areas in Israel.

title: Israel ‘at war’ after unprecedented assault by Hamas militants from Gaza
description: Hamas militants launched an unprecedented, multipronged attack across central and southern Israel Saturday, killing dozens of people. Israel responded with airstrikes across Gaza.

title: In photos: Hamas unleashes attack from Gaza on Israel
description: The militant Hamas rulers of the Gaza Strip have carried out an unprecedented, multifront attack on Israel, firing thousands of rockets as dozens of Hamas fighters infiltrated the heavily fortified border. Israel says at least 40 people have died.

title: Mapping the deadly surprise attack by Hamas militants on Israel
description: At least 40 Israelis have been killed and more than 700 injured.

title: The Israeli-Palestinian conflict: A chronology
description: The recent flare-up of violence between Israel and militants in the Gaza Strip has brought new attention to an old problem.

title: Flooding in Indian Himalayas kills 50, leaves tourists stranded
description: Authorities are waiting for better weather to allow helicopter rescues in Sikkim state, after a glacial lake overflowed during extreme rainfall this week.

title: Ex-Army sergeant accused of trying to hand defense secrets to China
description: Joseph Daniel Schmidt, an active duty soldier from 2015 to 2020, had access to top-secret and secret national security information, authorities said.

title: Live updates: Israel declares ‘state of alert for war’ after major Hamas attack
description: Israel ordered residents in areas around the Gaza Strip to remain inside after “infiltrations” by a number of Hamas militants, the Israeli Defense Forces said.

title: Ukraine live briefing: The village of Hroza mourns after devastating strike leaves at least 52 dead
description: The U.N. human rights chief sent a team to the site of the missile strikes, which were among the war’s deadliest and killed at least one-sixth of the village’s population.

title: Ukraine battles to shape the narrative on its grueling counteroffensive
description: Despite some Ukrainian progress in breaking through dense Russian defenses, fears of a frozen conflict loom.

title: Drugs and gentrification: Görlitzer Park reflects Berlin’s growing pains
description: A gang rape in Berlin’s Görlitzer Park has thrown the notorious green space back into the headlines, prompting calls for more social intervention in the drug haven.
